item.description:
We will see the film and then go out for a drink at a local pub in the mall near the movie theater.
There are two simultaneous meetups for In Bruges, one at the Embassy Theater in Waltham and another at the Kendall Square Cinema in Cambridge. This is the meetup at Kendall Square.
[b]Summary:[/b]
Ray (Colin Farrell) and Ken (Brendan Gleeson) are hit men who, after completing their latest job in London, are ordered by their boss (Ralph Fiennes) to go hide out in Bruges, Belgium. Although they are supposed to stay out of trouble, they have no problem finding some ? quickly.
[b]Trailer[/b] <xobject width="425" height="355"><xembed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/mYOlmlvED5g&rel=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="355" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></xembed></xobject>
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a green Bruins cap with a shamrock for Erin (Ireland) in the lobby of the Kendall Square Cinema.
item.why: People should come to this film who like action films and films about Ireland.
item.name: In Bruges
